attributes.action: sack Chancellor Alistair Darling after the legislation regarding Northern Rock has been implemented and then for the Prime Minister to publicly apologise to the country for the debt they now are burdened with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the handling of the Northern Rock crisis we feel that Alistair Darling should be sacked for saddling the country with greater financial risk and that the crisis was handled incorrectly. The Prime Minister should apologise to the country for the way the Government handled this Northern Rock crisis.
